ModMetaData.name: Firefoam Grenades [1.0/1.1]
ModMetaData.author: ✬Rustic Fox✬
ModMetaData.description:
Allows you to craft firefoam grenades for! 20 steel 1 component.
Throw them like a regular grenade
Compatibility - Should be compatable with everything.
Older versions - https://github.com/RusticFox/Firefoam-Grendes/
v1.3.1.4
